item.title: Watch: Trump puts Washington, DC, police under federal control, deploys National Guard
item.description: Trump in a social media post on Sunday declared that "the Homeless" in Washington, D.C., will "have to move out."

item.title: Trump warns homeless people to leave Washington, DC, ‘immediately’
item.description: President Donald Trump has also increased his rhetoric about countering crime in the nation's capital, even as data shows crime rates in the city are ...

item.title: Judge rejects unsealing Ghislaine Maxwell grand jury transcripts
item.description: The Trump administration has faced criticism for reneging on promises to release investigative files about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

item.title: Trump to speak at White House on violent crime in DC amid federal crackdown
item.description: President Donald Trump ramped up his rhetoric about crime in Washington, D.C., after a former member of DOGE was assaulted in an attempted carjacking.

item.title: Democrats slam GOP redistricting fight as 'cheating' as Texas Gov. Abbott threatens arrests
item.description: Democratic lawmakers said the party has "got to fight back" against the redistricting effort in Texas.
